payload.special_properties_text: Gungans treat as simple weapon instead of exotic. Can be used to hurl energy balls (see Ranged Weapons section for energy ball statistics).

parsed_properties.description: Gungans treat as simple weapon instead of exotic.
Can be used to hurl energy balls (see Ranged Weapons section for energy ball statistics).

payload.name: Force Pike
payload.full_text_description: Force pikes are 1-meter-long poles topped with power tips. A two-setting power dial located near the bottom of the pike allows the user to set the weapon to “lethal” or “stun.” Although primarily a vibro weapon, the force pike also delivers an electrical shock through its tip, dealing both piercing and energy damage. A force pike requires two energy cells to operate.

payload.special_properties_text: Wookiees treat bowcasters as rifles instead of exotic weapons. Accurate: This weapon takes no penalty when firing at targets at short range.

parsed_properties.description: Wookiees treat bowcasters as rifles instead of exotic weapons.
Accurate: This weapon takes no penalty when firing at targets at short range.

payload.special_properties_text: Cannot hurl thermal detonators. Can be mounted on a rifle. Inaccurate: This weapon cannot fire at targets at long range.

parsed_properties.description: Can be mounted on a rifle.
Inaccurate: This weapon cannot fire at targets at long range.

payload.special_properties_text: Allows grab or grapple attack at range. Inaccurate: This weapon cannot fire at targets at long range.

parsed_properties.description: Allows grab or grapple attack at range.
Inaccurate: This weapon cannot fire at targets at long range.

payload.special_properties_text: Timer can be set from 6 seconds (1 round) to 18 seconds (3 rounds). Inaccurate: This weapon cannot fire at targets at long range.

parsed_properties.description: Timer can be set from 6 seconds (1 round) to 18 seconds (3 rounds).
Inaccurate: This weapon cannot fire at targets at long range.

payload.special_properties_text: Allows grab or grapple attack at range. From Boba Fett's stat block (CRB p.271, text file p.272)

parsed_properties.description: Allows grab or grapple attack at range.
From Boba Fett's stat block (CRB p.271, text file p.272)

payload.special_properties_text: Standard equipment for Advanced Recon Commandos. Includes helmet package functions.

payload.speed_penalty_text: Reduces speed to 3/4 (e.g., 6sq->4sq; 4sq->3sq); Run speed x3
payload.special_properties_text: Contains a sealed life support system providing 24 hours of survival in vacuum or hostile environments.
payload.full_text_description: This bulky coverall contains a sealed life support system that provides everything the wearer needs to survive for 24 hours in the vacuum of space or any other hostile environment.

Battle armor combines protective metal or composite plates with a padded jumpsuit to form a layer of protection. While off-the-rack battle armor is available, most users cobble together their gear from various sources.

payload.speed_penalty_text: Reduces speed to 3/4 (e.g., 6sq->4sq; 4sq->3sq); Run speed x3
payload.full_text_description: Similar to regular battle armor, heavy battle armor features more plating than padding, including various pieces molded to fit the user, such as breastplates and armor covering the arms and legs.
This armor consists of a lightweight helmet and a composite vest that, when worn together, offer limited protection against incoming attacks.

Ceremonial armor blends practicality with ornate design. Republic Guards and Imperial Royal Guards wear different styles of ceremonial armor. A typical suit of ceremonial armor consists of a helmet, durable breast guard, shoulder guards, and articulated greaves for the arms and legs.

payload.special_properties_text: Standard issue armor for Republic Clone Troopers. Includes helmet package functions (integrated comlink, +2 Perception, low-light vision). Based on Stormtrooper Armor stats.

payload.full_text_description: This heavily padded jumpsuit is designed to provide limited protection against physical and energy trauma without overly restricting the wearer's movement.

payload.special_properties_text: Contains an energized exoskeleton and servomotors. Grants wearer a +2 equipment bonus to Strength if proficient with Medium Armor.

parsed_properties.description: Grants wearer a +2 equipment bonus to Strength if proficient with Medium Armor.

payload.full_text_description: This suit of body armor contains an energized exoskeleton and a series of servomotors that boosts the wearer's physical strength. Used by professional soldiers, mercenaries, and bounty hunters, the powersuit requires skill and training to use effectively. The Corellian powersuit grants its wearer a +2 equipment bonus to Strength, but only if the wearer has the Armor Proficiency (medium) feat.

payload.special_properties_text: Based on armored flight suit, heavily modified. Includes life support. Helmet package functions integrated.
payload.full_text_description: Darth Vader's custom armor is a heavily modified suit of armored flight suit, providing substantial protection and integrated life support systems critical to his survival. It includes functions equivalent to a helmet package.

payload.speed_penalty_text: Droid speed unaffected unless noted by specific droid design.
payload.special_properties_text: Cost: 10,000 x Cost Factor. Weight: 10 x Cost Factor kg. For droids, armor does not typically reduce speed unless the droid's design is specifically impacted.

payload.speed_penalty_text: Droid speed unaffected unless noted by specific droid design.
payload.special_properties_text: Cost: 6,400 x Cost Factor. Weight: 16 x Cost Factor kg.

payload.speed_penalty_text: Droid speed unaffected unless noted by specific droid design.
payload.special_properties_text: Cost: 9,600 x Cost Factor. Weight: 8 x Cost Factor kg.
Cost: 3,600 x Cost Factor. Weight: 12 x Cost Factor kg.
Cost: 1,600 x Cost Factor. Weight: 8 x Cost Factor kg.

identifier.name: Energy shields, heavy SR 25 (Calo Nord's Verpine Prototype)

payload.full_text_description: When installed in the helmet of a suit of armor, this electronic package allows the armor to grant the wearer a +2 equipment bonus on Perception checks as well as low-light vision. In addition, it includes an integrated hands-free comlink. Stormtrooper armor and its variants include such a system (MFTAS, or Multi-Frequency Target Acquisition System), already included in its statistics. Installing a helmet package takes 1 hour and a DC 20 Mechanics check.
payload.comments_and_effects_text: Grants wearer +2 equip. bonus on Perception checks, low-light vision, and an integrated hands-free comlink. Install: 1 hr, DC 20 Mechanics.

payload.full_text_description: A standard targeting scope reduces the range by one category (for example, from medium to short range). However, you must aim at your target to gain this benefit, and you lose the benefit if you change targets or lose line of sight to your target. Installing a targeting scope on a rifle or pistol requires 10 minutes and a DC 10 Mechanics check.
payload.comments_and_effects_text: Standard. Reduces weapon range penalty by one category if aimed. Install: 10 min, DC 10 Mechanics.

parsed_effects.description: Reduces weapon range penalty by one category if aimed.

payload.full_text_description: An enhanced low-light targeting scope functions the same as a standard targeting scope in normal light. However, after aiming at a target, it allows the wielder to ignore concealment (but not total concealment) from darkness when attacking that target. Installing a targeting scope on a rifle or pistol requires 10 minutes and a DC 10 Mechanics check.
payload.comments_and_effects_text: Enhanced Low-Light. Functions as standard scope; additionally, if aimed, allows wielder to ignore concealment (but not total) from darkness. Install: 10 min, DC 10 Mechanics.

parsed_effects.description: If aimed, allows wielder to ignore concealment (but not total concealment) from darkness.

payload.full_text_description: This wrap-around cloak protects its wearer from the elements, providing a +5 equipment bonus to its wearer's Fortitude Defense against extreme heat or cold (see Extreme Temperatures, page 254).
payload.special_properties_text: +5 equip. bonus to Fortitude Defense against extreme heat or cold.

parsed_effects.description: +5 equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense against extreme heat or cold.

payload.name: Antiox breath mask
payload.full_text_description: Special breath mask required by Kel Dor to survive in standard nitrogen/oxygen atmospheres. Includes vocoder. Replacement filters cost 200 credits for a year's supply (50 on Dorin).
payload.special_properties_text: Required for Kel Dor survival off Dorin. Poisonous to other species.

parsed_effects.description: Required for Kel Dor survival in non-native atmospheres. Provides breathable air from filters.

payload.full_text_description: While underwater, an Aquata Breather can provide up to 2 hours of breathable air through its mouthpiece.
payload.special_properties_text: Provides 2 hours of breathable air underwater.

parsed_effects.description: Provides 2 hours of breathable air underwater.

payload.full_text_description: This large, specialized tank is filled with the powerful healing agent, bacta, which promotes rapid healing. Requires 300 liters of bacta to fill. Used in conjunction with surgery or to treat disease, poison, or radiation.
payload.special_properties_text: Requires bacta to function. Aids in healing.

parsed_effects.description: Promotes rapid healing when filled with bacta.

payload.full_text_description: A powerful healing agent used in bacta tanks.

payload.name: Bandolier
payload.full_text_description: A bandolier has 12 slots that can each hold a single Tiny weapon (such as a grenade or a knife) or a single piece of equipment weighing up to 0.5 kg. Any item on the bandolier can be retrieved as a move action.
payload.special_properties_text: Holds 12 Tiny items (up to 0.5kg each). Retrieve as move action.

parsed_effects.description: Holds 12 Tiny items. Retrieval is a move action.

payload.full_text_description: Durasteel restraints designed to lock two limbs of a prisoner. DR 10, 20 HP, Break DC 30 Str or DC 25 Mechanics to remove without code.
payload.special_properties_text: DR 10, 20 HP. Break DC 30 Str. DC 25 Mechanics to open.

payload.full_text_description: This personal atmosphere-filtering system consists of a mask that fits over the nose and mouth and a hose connecting the mask to a portable life-support system. A breath mask provides 1 hour of breathable atmosphere before the filter and atmosphere canister must be replaced. A functional breath mask grants immunity to inhaled poisons, including poisonous atmospheres.
payload.special_properties_text: Provides 1 hour of breathable air. Immune to inhaled poisons.

parsed_effects.description: Provides 1 hour of breathable air. Grants immunity to inhaled poisons.

payload.name: Breath mask, atmosphere filter
payload.full_text_description: Replacement filter and atmosphere canister for a breath mask.

This 3-meter (2-square) length of chain has damage reduction 10 and 5 hit points. It has Strength 44 and can safely support over 5 metric tons of weight, and it can be broken with a DC 32 Strength check.
payload.special_properties_text: DR 10, 5 HP. Break DC 32 Str.

payload.full_text_description: A compact encoded security device issued to many military, political, or corporate officials, a code cylinder accesses computer data via a droid's scomp link or provides entry into restricted facilities. Each cylinder features the user's personal security clearance data.
payload.special_properties_text: Storage device (Int 10, Will Def 15). Hostile attitude, self-destructs if Use Computer check fails by 5+.

parsed_effects.description: Provides access based on security clearance.

payload.name: Comlink, encryption
payload.full_text_description: A comlink can have hardwired encryption routines, adding +10 to the DC of all Use Computer checks made to intercept your transmission, for ten times the base cost of the comlink.
payload.special_properties_text: Adds +10 to DC to intercept transmission. Modifies a base comlink.

parsed_effects.description: Increases DC to intercept messages by +10.

payload.name: Comlink, holo capability
payload.full_text_description: A comlink can have holo capability (three-dimensional images in addition to audio) for five times the base cost of the comlink.
payload.special_properties_text: Allows transmission/reception of 3D holo images. Modifies a base comlink.

payload.full_text_description: Has a range of 200 kilometers or high orbit, and requires a backpack-sized comset. For double the cost, can be miniaturized to wrist-size.
payload.special_properties_text: Range 200km or high orbit. Requires comset (or double cost for wrist-size).

payload.full_text_description: Has a range of 50 kilometers or low orbit. Can be built into helmets and armor.
payload.special_properties_text: Range 50km or low orbit.

payload.name: Comlink, video capability
payload.full_text_description: A comlink can have video capability (two-dimensional images in addition to audio) for twice the base cost of the comlink.
payload.special_properties_text: Allows transmission/reception of 2D video images. Modifies a base comlink.

payload.full_text_description: A small, flat card that features a security codeout and credit algorithm memory stripes. Securely tracks and transacts funds. Storage device (Int 10, Will Def 15), hostile attitude, self-destructs if Use Computer check fails by 5+.
payload.special_properties_text: Securely stores and transacts credits. Int 10, Will Def 15. Self-destructs on tampering.

cost.description: Does not include surgical cost (500 credits).

payload.full_text_description: Mechanical replacement for a limb or extremity. Requires Cybernetic Surgery feat to install. Performs as well as original limb. Takes full damage from ion weapons. -1 to Use the Force checks per prosthetic (max -5).
payload.special_properties_text: Replaces limb/extremity. Takes full ion damage. -1 Use the Force per prosthetic (max -5).

parsed_effects.description: Replaces a lost limb or extremity.

payload.full_text_description: Simple storage device with Intelligence 2. Used as external storage for a computer. No direct interface.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 2. For data storage.

payload.full_text_description: Handheld personal computer (notebook, planner, calculator). Can interface with larger networks. Computer with Intelligence 12.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 12.

payload.full_text_description: Simpler datapad, primarily a storage device with display, input, and editing capability. No ability to run programs. Intelligence 10.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 10. Primarily for data storage and viewing/editing.

payload.full_text_description: Magnifies distant objects. Internal display for range, azimuth, elevation. Zoom/wide-vision. Radiation sensors and nightvision mode (grants darkvision to user's normal sight range). Reduces range penalty on Perception checks to -1 per 10 squares.
payload.special_properties_text: Reduces Perception range penalty to -1/10sq. Darkvision. Radiation sensors.

payload.full_text_description: Small flat disk battery providing power for devices, including certain types of weapons. Can be recharged with a power recharger.
payload.special_properties_text: Standard power source for many small devices and weapons.

payload.full_text_description: Backpack full of survival gear: two condensing canteens with water purification, sunshield roll, week's food rations, two glow rods, two breath masks, 24 filters, 12 atmosphere canisters, and an all-temperature cloak. Needed for Survival checks to endure extreme temperatures.
payload.special_properties_text: Contains various survival items. Required for some Survival skill uses.

payload.full_text_description: Produces a chemical cloud providing total concealment (1sq radius per round of use, dissipates in 3 rounds). Can put out fires up to 10 squares. 10 uses. Reloadable.
payload.special_properties_text: Creates obscuring cloud. Extinguishes fires.

payload.full_text_description: The flight suit is a one-piece coverall (plus a helmet) that provides life support, protects the wearer from hostile environments, and prevents the wearer from succumbing to the adverse effects of high-velocity flying. A flight suit includes a matching helmet and gloves that seal around the wearer and provide up to 10 hours of life support. As long as you have life support remaining, you are immune to any hostile atmosphere or inhaled poison hazard. The suit also grants a +1 equipment bonus to your Fortitude Defense.
payload.special_properties_text: Provides 10 hours of life support. Grants +1 equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense. Immune to hostile atmospheres/inhaled poisons while active.

parsed_effects.description: Grants +1 equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense.

payload.full_text_description: A hand-held light source larger than a glow rod, the fusion lantern produces light and heat. The light spreads out from the lantern, producing illumination in a 6-square radius.
payload.special_properties_text: Produces light and heat in a 6-square radius.

payload.full_text_description: A glow rod is a portable illumination device that projects a beam of light up to 6 squares.
payload.special_properties_text: Projects a beam of light 6 squares long.

parsed_effects.description: Projects a beam of light 6 squares long.

payload.full_text_description: When installed in the helmet of a suit of armor, this electronic package allows the armor to grant the wearer a +2 equipment bonus on Perception checks as well as low-light vision. In addition, it includes an integrated hands-free comlink. Installing a helmet package takes 1 hour and a DC 20 Mechanics check.
payload.special_properties_text: Grants wearer +2 equip. bonus on Perception checks, low-light vision, and an integrated hands-free comlink. Install: 1 hr, DC 20 Mechanics.

payload.full_text_description: A handheld, personal hologram transmitter used to view real-time or recorded three-dimensional images or pass information via comlink. Storage device with Intelligence 2, stores 1 hour of holo recording or 1,000 holo images.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 2. Stores 1 hr holo recording or 1000 images.

payload.name: Holster, Concealed
payload.full_text_description: Designed to keep a weapon out of sight (e.g., shoulder, waistband, ankle, boot, wrist holsters). Allows drawing a concealed weapon as a move action but with a -5 penalty on Stealth check to conceal the weapon.
payload.special_properties_text: For Small or Tiny weapons/single-bladed lightsabers. Draw concealed as move (-5 Stealth penalty).

payload.name: Holster, Hip
payload.full_text_description: Holds weapon in an easily accessed and visible location. Generally available for Medium or smaller weapons.
payload.special_properties_text: For Medium or smaller weapons.

payload.full_text_description: A propulsion system allowing flight over short distances. Activate as swift action, grants fly speed of 6 squares. 10 charges. DC 20 Pilot check if landing after moving >12 squares in a turn; failure results in prone. Lifts up to 180kg. Replacement fuel cells cost 100 credits.
payload.special_properties_text: Fly speed 6 sq. 10 charges. Lifts 180kg.

payload.full_text_description: Contains a special liquid that instantly solidifies on contact with atmosphere or vacuum to form a tough, lightweight, flexible cable. Dispenses 15 meters (10 squares) of cable. Cable has Strength 28, supports 560kg, Break DC 24 Str. Refillable.
payload.special_properties_text: Dispenses 15m cable. Str 28, Break DC 24 Str.

payload.full_text_description: Backpack-sized kit with diagnostic scanners, anti-venom, medicines, burn treatments, defibrillators, respirator, shock blankets, pressure cuffs, repulsorlift stretcher. Required to revive, treat disease/poison/radiation.
payload.special_properties_text: Comprehensive medical supplies. Required for specific Treat Injury uses.

payload.full_text_description: Compact package with bandages, bacta, synthetic flesh, coagulants, stimulants for first aid. Expended on use. Can only benefit once per 24 hours.
payload.special_properties_text: Single-use first aid kit.

payload.full_text_description: Adhesive tape. Adhesive Strength 15 (supports 90kg indefinitely, 180kg for 5 rounds). Tape Strength 20 (Break DC 20 Str). Roll provides 30 meters of 5cm wide tape.
payload.special_properties_text: Strong adhesive tape. 30m roll.

payload.full_text_description: Add-on device for communications gear. Encodes outgoing messages. Intercepted messages require DC 30 Use Computer check to decrypt.
payload.special_properties_text: Encrypts communications. DC 30 Use Computer to decrypt.

payload.full_text_description: Compact computer for complex programs on the go. Intelligence 14.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 14.

payload.full_text_description: Small fusion reactor for continuous power for heavy weapons, vehicles, structures. Explodes if destroyed (1d20+10 attack vs Reflex in 4sq, 8d6 energy damage).
payload.special_properties_text: Provides continuous power. Explodes on destruction.

payload.full_text_description: Compact rectangular battery for energy weapons. Rechargeable.
payload.special_properties_text: Ammunition for most blaster weapons.

payload.full_text_description: Recharges one power pack or energy cell in 4 hours. Holds power for 100 recharges or connects to building/ship power for unlimited capacity.
payload.special_properties_text: Recharges power packs/energy cells.

payload.full_text_description: Compact meal providing one day's nourishment for a range of species. Does not include water.
payload.special_properties_text: One day's food.

payload.name: Recording unit, audiorecorder
payload.full_text_description: Storage device (Int 1) with playback. Stores 100 hours of high-quality sound. DC 15 Use Computer to modify recording.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 1. Stores 100 hrs audio.

payload.name: Recording unit, holorecorder
payload.full_text_description: Storage device (Int 1) with playback. Stores 1 hour of high-quality holo recordings. DC 15 Use Computer to modify recording.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 1. Stores 1 hr holo.

payload.name: Recording unit, videorecorder
payload.full_text_description: Storage device (Int 1) with playback. Stores 10 hours of high-quality video. DC 15 Use Computer to modify recording.
payload.special_properties_text: Int 1. Stores 10 hrs video.

payload.full_text_description: Set of special tools for bypassing electronic and mechanical locks. Includes electronic components and dedicated sensor devices. Required for some Mechanics skill uses (e.g., disarming traps/security). Includes comlink to monitor silent alarm frequencies.
payload.special_properties_text: For bypassing locks/security. Monitors silent alarms.

payload.full_text_description: Portable scanning device with readout display and scanning dish. Provides general details on comm signals, life forms, and hazards within 1 kilometer. Operating grants +5 circumstance bonus on Perception checks.
payload.special_properties_text: Scans 1km. Grants +5 Perception bonus when active.

parsed_effects.description: +5 circumstance bonus on Perception checks when operating.

payload.full_text_description: This bulky coverall contains a sealed life support system that provides everything the wearer needs to survive for 24 hours in the vacuum of space or any other hostile environment. As long as you have life support remaining, you are immune to any atmosphere or inhaled poison hazard. The suit also grants a +2 equipment bonus to your Fortitude Defense.
payload.special_properties_text: Provides 24 hours of life support. Grants +2 equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense. Immune to vacuum/hostile atmospheres/inhaled poisons while active.

parsed_effects.description: Grants +2 equipment bonus to Fortitude Defense.

payload.full_text_description: Small kit with instruments needed to perform surgery using the Treat Injury skill. Required for Perform Surgery.
payload.special_properties_text: Required for Perform Surgery Treat Injury skill use.

payload.full_text_description: Coil of 45 meters (30 squares) of strong, durable rope. Strength 30, supports 720kg, Break DC 25 Str. Reusable.
payload.special_properties_text: 45m. Str 30, Break DC 25 Str.

payload.name: Targeting scope, enhanced low-light
payload.full_text_description: An enhanced low-light targeting scope functions the same as a standard targeting scope in normal light. However, after aiming at a target, it allows the wielder to ignore concealment (but not total concealment) from darkness when attacking that target. Installing a targeting scope on a rifle or pistol requires 10 minutes and a DC 10 Mechanics check.
payload.special_properties_text: Enhanced Low-Light. Functions as standard scope; additionally, if aimed, allows wielder to ignore concealment (but not total) from darkness. Install: 10 min, DC 10 Mechanics.

parsed_effects.description: If aimed, allows wielder to ignore concealment (but not total concealment) from darkness.

payload.name: Targeting scope, standard
payload.full_text_description: A standard targeting scope reduces the range by one category (for example, from medium to short range). However, you must aim at your target to gain this benefit, and you lose the benefit if you change targets or lose line of sight to your target. Installing a targeting scope on a rifle or pistol requires 10 minutes and a DC 10 Mechanics check.
payload.special_properties_text: Standard. Reduces weapon range penalty by one category if aimed. Install: 10 min, DC 10 Mechanics.

parsed_effects.description: Reduces weapon range penalty by one category if aimed.

payload.name: Timer (for Explosives)
payload.full_text_description: A device used to set a delay for explosives like Detonite or Explosive Charges. Standard timers can be set with up to an hour delay.
payload.special_properties_text: Sets delay for explosives. From Table 8-6: Explosives.

payload.full_text_description: Broad collection of tools for analyzing, modifying, and rebuilding technological devices. Required for reprogramming droids or repairing damaged droids/vehicles. Contents include electroshock probe, fusion cutter, etc.
payload.special_properties_text: Required for various Mechanics skill uses.

parsed_effects.description: General purpose tool collection for repairs and modifications.

payload.full_text_description: Contains several pouches with: 3-day food capsules, medpac, tool kit, spare power pack, spare energy cell, glow rod, comlink, liquid cable dispenser with grappling hook, and empty pouches. Weight includes typical load.
payload.special_properties_text: Carries a variety of essential gear.

payload.full_text_description: Simple audio playback unit with 12 preprogrammed phrases in Basic. Useful for species that understand but cannot speak Basic. Phrases can be altered with a DC 10 Use Computer check.
payload.special_properties_text: Plays 12 preprogrammed audio phrases.

identifier.name: Cybernetics, Borg Construct Datacard/Know cart port

payload.special_properties_text: Stable contact explosive. Can be shaped or molded. Requires a timer.
Highly restricted. Delivers destructive energy to a specific point. Mechanics check ignores DR of attached objects; good check result increases damage.
Used to set delay for explosives. Standard timers can be set with up to an hour delay. Longer delays require specialized timers.
